phrs.translation: 处理；转让；解决；吃光；除掉；卖掉

sentences.sentence: Aides spoke of disposing of records that would embarrass the governor.
sentences.translation: 助手们谈到了要处理掉那些会给州长找麻烦的记录。

sentences.sentence: Because of the high cost of disposing of these things in landfills, many city governments now have recycling programs.
sentences.translation: 由于在垃圾填埋场处理这些东西的成本较高，许多市政府现在都有回收计划。

sentences.sentence: He was kept busy disposing of his heap of manuscripts.
sentences.translation: 他忙着处理他那一大堆旧稿。
